entry.title: The Prince & The Pauper
entry.summary:
Author: plotcole (Quint_Essentially)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,768Chapters: 21/26Kudos: 48

Summary: Extract from ‘Knights of the Temples: The Prince Arthur Story’ by T. H. Blanc, published 2021: 'There we have it. Violence, intrigue, danger, romance, and self-sacrifice. In a couple of short months, Captain Arthur Pendragon, eldest son of The Most Honourable The Marquess of Camelot, Lord Uther Pendragon, almost singlehandedly dismantled one of the most covert and sinister arms of the Axis Powers’ military forces, ensuring that its leader and the secret weapons she had designed would never again see the light of day. ' OR: The story of a young nobleman who couldn't stand by when his country needed him, and his loyal companion who would follow Arthur to the very ends of the Earth if he had to.

entry.title: Lessons in pleasure
entry.summary:
Author: Ace_Teagirl

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,882Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 169

Summary: “One of my girls mentioned she saw a new face at the market today. A pretty boy looking for employment. I have a proposition for you, if you want to accompany me inside,” the woman said.Her voice was warm and her smile almost motherly. It made Merlin ache for the comfort of his home. He looked at her uncertainly. Merlin may have had a sheltered upbringing in his small farming village, but he could imagine what kind of work she had to offer him, and he wasn’t sure he wanted it. Still, he stood up, shaking slightly from hunger and exhaustion. There was something in this woman’s eyes that compelled Merlin to trust her.

entry.title: ...How to be not straight (for very good reasons)
entry.summary:
Author: SueRose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,927Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 27

Summary: Rich nepo boy Arthur Pendragon joins his university's queer club. And pretends to be queer, because he needs to write a paper about queer representation. But.... He has not expected this. This being the leader of the club, namely Merlins Emrys, who does not believe a word he says. Will he be able to appear queer enough to his new peers? Or will all.of this end up in a giant disaster?

entry.title: Knight (King) with the Two Swords
entry.summary:
Author: OfTintagel

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,718Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: Arthur had killed Merlin._________________________________ In Arthurian legends, a mysterious damsel bearing a sword that only the most virtuous knight would be able to draw comes to Arthur’s court. Many tries, but Balin succeeds to draw the sword.When the Lady asks the sword back Balin refuses to give it back, causing Lady to cursing or saying a prophecy that he will kill the man he loved the most with the sword. Sir Balin later kills his brother in a combat, not knowing the man was his brother. And in some of the versions, Sir Lancelot kills Gwaine, the man he loves the most in the legend. Now took the sword from them and give it to Arthur.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,881Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Author: schweet_heart

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,830Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 70

Summary: “Morgana lives to embarrass me. entry.title: The Holy Grail
entry.summary:
Author: xKiller_Queenx

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,507Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Worthy kings get worthy tombs. Great kings get desperate attempts to be preserved in a magical eternal slumber. Legendary kings might never really die. Merlin has been a lot of things over the past millennium, but most importantly a scholar obsessed with finding his Once and Future King. It is but in the 21st century that he comes across a young Virginian boy with equally ambitious dreams. The thing that made Merlin look twice weren't his impossible dreams -anyone could dream- but his succes. If Gansey could do the impossible, if he could find Glendower's lost tomb, surely he can help Merlin on his quest to find King Arthur.

entry.summary:
Author: dante0220

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,504Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 15

Summary: In the "Wicked Day", Merlin tries to save Uther's life. As Emrys, he tries to cast the healing spell. Unfortunately, Morgana's necklace contains an *extra* twist. There Merlin realizes still more about his secondary royal destiny.

entry.title: The Winter Prince
entry.summary:
Author: MerlinsBrokenHeart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,864Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 20

Summary: “Dear Santa, all I want for Christmas is for my daddy to have someone to love and take care of him when I’m gone… ”Seven-year-old Izzy Pendragon is running out of time. Her devoted father, Arthur, is running out of hope. It's one week til Christmas, he just buried his father, and his daughter is slowly slipping away...she's dying of cancer. Then Merlin Ambrose—a lonely toymaker with magic in his fingertips and heartbreak in his eyes—enters their lives. And with one perfect doll and an impossible miracle, he changes everything. Sometimes the greatest gifts are the ones we never dared ask for.
